channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Does a Movie Projector Show the Color Black?
item.description: There’s no such thing as black-colored light. So how can we see Darth Vader on a screen?

item.title: Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon will face fraud charges in the US

item.title: The Paper Passport Is Dying

item.title: Simplify Your Morning With a One-Step Coffee-Weighing Cup
item.description: You can get whole seconds back every morning by measuring your coffee beans in the Subminimal Subscale dosing cup.

item.title: Cyber firm’s Chrome extension hijacked to steal user passwords
item.description: The data-loss startup says it was targeted as part of a "wider campaign to target Chrome extension developers." © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved...

item.title: 17 Best Smart Home Lighting (2024): Decorative Panels, LED Strips, and Ambient Lamps
item.description: Add some color to your life, find accent lighting to match your mood, and transform the feel of your home with these decorative connected devices.
